tool_description: Searches multiple grant databases and funding sources based on specified criteria, returning a curated list of relevant funding opportunities with basic details.

research_domain.description: Primary research or project domain (e.g., healthcare, education, environment, social services)

organization_type.description: Type of applying organization (nonprofit, academic, government, for-profit, individual)

keywords.description: Specific keywords related to the project or research area

deadline_months.description: Number of months from now to search for deadlines (1-24)

error_messages: Invalid funding amount range: Minimum amount must be less than maximum amount and both must be positive integers.
Invalid geographic scope: Must be one of 'local', 'state', 'national', 'international'.
Invalid organization type: Must be one of 'nonprofit', 'academic', 'government', 'for-profit', 'individual'.
Invalid deadline range: deadline_months must be between 1 and 24.
Search returned no results: Try broadening your search criteria or adjusting keywords.
usage: Specify research_domain and organization_type as required parameters. Optionally set funding amount range, geographic scope, keywords array, and deadline timeframe. The tool returns matching grant opportunities with basic information.

total_results.description: Total number of funding opportunities found

grant_ids.description: Unique identifiers for each grant opportunity

funding_amounts.description: Funding amount ranges for each opportunity

application_deadlines.description: Application deadline dates in date-time format
